sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Allow delete on ml_capability_definition_base table</description> <name>Allow Delete ml_capability_definition_ba</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object'); gr.addQuery('name','ml_capability_definition_base'); gr.query(); if(gr.next()){ gr.delete_access = true; gr.update(); gs.info('Upgrade Script: Delete Application Access Updated for ml_capability_definition_base table'); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-04-24 07:04:37</sys_created_on> <sys_id>802dc7cf53522110d3d5ddeeff7b12a1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Allow Delete ml_capability_definition_ba</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Predictive Intelligence" source="com.glide.platform_ml">c41430683c31311068bcf327dfe37f28</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_802dc7cf53522110d3d5ddeeff7b12a1</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-04-24 07:04:37</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
